name: Amber
description: Embark on an enchanting journey alongside Amber as she ventures through the whimsical realms of Candy, Cake, Story, Rainbow, and Crystal in this captivating action-adventure platformer. Spread love and restore harmony to the vibrant inhabitants as you wield the radiant power of Amber Crystals. Use her Mallet, Chocolate Staff, and Bubblegum Wand to gently pacify unruly denizens. Navigate gracefully through these fantastical lands, running, jumping, and gliding with the Rainbow Umbrella, and even taking a dip in crystal-clear or chocolatey waters. Seek out each kingdom's sovereign and engage them in a transformative encounter, bringing balance and harmony back to this extraordinary world.
